name: Pilot (Pith_Dev)
description:
The lands are filled with unknown entities, some possessing greater intelligence than others

Playing as a lost pilot, your aim is to traverse the unknown lands, collecting fuel cells to take your ship to safety.

My first project and my first introduction into the world of game development. I made this project for my skills section of the Duke of Edinburgh Bronze award, as a way for me to first utilise the Unity Game Engine.
